description:
This presentation was recorded at GOTO Copenhagen 2016
http://gotocph.com

Wouter Kuijpers, Dan North, Joern Larsen, Gregory Pelcha

ABSTRACT
Will it be possible to create robots able to beat humans in soccer? In this session we will start by having Tech United (http://www.techunited.nl) present their vision on creating a team of robots able to beat the soccer world champions. After that we will have a panel discussion on robotics and the future of robotics. [...]

Download slides and read the full abstract here:
https://gotocon.com/cph-2016/presentations/show_talk.jsp?oid=7762

https://www.facebook.com/GOTOConference
http://gotocon.com
title: GOTO 2016 • Panel Discussion: The Future of Robotics
